Plot: After his father's death, Gilbert has to care for his mentally-disabled brother, Arnie, and his morbidly obese mother. This situation is suddenly challenged though, when love unexpectedly walks into his life.
Actors: Johnny Depp, Leonardo DiCaprio, Juliette Lewis, Mary Steenburgen
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 6 nominations.
Title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
